thread.title: Amazon to launch Prime Day one-day shopping event
thread.title_full: Amazon to launch Prime Day one-day shopping event - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Amazon to launch Prime Day one-day shopping event
text: Amazon is celebrating it's 20th birthday by launching a one-day shopping event, Prime Day. Prime Day promises more deals than Black Friday with new deals every 10 minutes throughout the 15th of July. Amazon says that "Prime members can shop for exclusive deals from electronics, toys, video games, movies, clothing, patio, lawn and garden, sports and outdoor items and more". To access the Prime Day deals you will need to be an Amazon Prime member. Signup to a free 30 day Amazon Prime trial to get instant access to Prime Day deals. Follow @telegraph
